list_definition.definition: to deal with, or behave towards (a thing or person), in a certain manner

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The soldiers treated me very well
The police are treating his death as a case of murder.

list_definition.definition: to try to cure (a person or disease, injury etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They treated her for a broken leg.

list_definition.mean_english: xử lý, nghiên cứu, giải quyết

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The woodwork has been treated with creosote.

list_definition.definition: to buy (a meal, present etc) for (someone)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She treated herself to a new hat.

list_definition.definition: to write or speak about; to discuss.
something that gives pleasure, eg an arranged outing, or some special food

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He took them to the theatre as a treat.
